parameters.name: NamespaceSource
parameters.description: The source of the namespace. Required only for specific third-party cases.

parameters.name: OriginalGroupId
parameters.description: The source application group to which the task belongs.

parameters.name: OriginalNamespace
parameters.description: The source namespace where the task resides.

parameters.name: TargetGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the destination application group to which the task will be synchronized.

parameters.name: TargetNamespace
parameters.description: The destination namespace to which the task will be synchronized.
